oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-02-16 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 16, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer - although Webb Pierce was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performers Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper and the Clinch Mountain Clan, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Del Wood; Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper; Clinch Mountain Clan; Chet Atkins; Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified piano instrumental] (Del Wood) [continued in part 2] -- Ray Price introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Ray Price, Grant Turner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ray Price introduces Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper -- Cheated Too (Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper and the Clinch Mountain Clan) -- Ray Price introduces Chet Atkins -- San Antonio Rose (Chet Atkins) -- Highway safety P.S.A. (Grant Turner) -- Ray Price talks -- I've Got A New Heartache (Ray Price) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ray Price) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Cooper, Carol Lee; Cooper, Stoney, 1918-1977; Cooper, Wilma Lee, 1921-2011; Clinch Mountain Clan; Price, Ray, 1926-2013
